title: Case 1
description: Statute of the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms, memorandum on the election of the presidium, work plan, 01/25/1919-01/28/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 2
description: Provisional regulation on international committees of the Red Cross, correspondence with international Russian and Ukrainian societies of the Red Cross on the provision of material and medical assistance to victims of pogroms. Certificates of representatives of the International Committee of the Red Cross, 03/07/1919-06/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 3
description: A copy of the instructions of the People's Commissariat of Social Security of the USSR, correspondence with the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms on the organization of aid to victims, copies of reports, 04/10/1919-06/15/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 4
description: Copy of the instructions of the legal commission to the commissioners of the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms on the procedure for investigating pogroms and for savings and credit societies on crediting victims of pogroms by providing loans, 03.1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 5
description: Circulars of the Jewish National Secretariat in Ukraine and correspondence with it about the local organization of committees to help victims of pogroms, collection of information about pogroms., 01.24.1919-04.02.1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 6
description: Minutes of the meetings of the presidium, plenum and revision commission of the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms, 01/20/1919-05/29/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 7
description: Report note of the Central Jewish Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms, correspondence with the People's Commissariat of Social Security of the USSR, the Kyiv Provincial Food Department and other Soviet institutions on the allocation of funds for assistance to victims of pogroms, correspondence with Jewish organizations in Kyiv on the organization of financial assistance to victims of pogroms, providing them with premises, 04.01.1919-04.01.1920, 0 sheet.

title: Case 8
description: Copies of the memorandum and letters of the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms to the People's Committee of Ukraine, the Executive Committee of the Kyiv Council of Workers' Deputies on pogroms by Affner's squad and on the organization of aid to victims of pogroms, 02/14/1919-05/29/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 9
description: Report notes of the Main Committee of the Society for the Protection of the Health of the Jewish Population (OSE) about its activities and correspondence with it about the organization of playgrounds and nurseries in pogrom-affected areas, 03/02/1919-12/31/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 10
description: Reports and report notes of the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms and the Aid Committee of the Russian Red Cross Society; correspondence with this committee about its activities, pogroms carried out by various groups, organization of assistance to victims of pogroms; Issuance of travel permits to members of the Central Jewish Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms. List of employees of institutions of the aid committee of the Russian Red Cross Society, 04/18/1919-06/11/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 11
description: Correspondence of the VRNG of the RSFSR with the Ruzhinsky Revkom and city Jewish administrations of communities on the organization of assistance to victims of pogroms, 03/02/1919-06/22/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 12
description: Correspondence with the All-Ukrainian Committee for Aid to the Jewish Population Victims of Military Actions on the allocation of funds for the provision of aid to victims of pogroms, 01/24/1919-11/23/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 34
description: The order of the head of the Denikin garrison on the introduction of a state of emergency in the city of Nizhyn. Copies of letters, information from the authorized Central Jewish Committee, the Jewish community in Chernihiv; testimonies of eyewitnesses and victims about the pogroms committed by Denikin's units and the UNR Army; lists of victims of pogroms, 10.03.1919-29.09.1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 35
description: Order of the Extraordinary Investigative Commission to investigate pogroms in Zhytomyr and Berdychiv on its organization and functions; report note of the head of security in Zhytomyr, testimony of eyewitnesses about the pogroms in Zhytomyr and Berdychiv, committed by separate units of the Army of the Ukrainian People's Republic. Certificates of pogrom victims, 01/26/1919-06/01/1919, 0 sheets.

description: Address of the Central Jewish Committee to public councils, 0 sheets.

description: Copies of the minutes of the meeting of the committee to help victims of pogroms and general meetings of the residents of Proskuriv, correspondence with the representative of the Central Jewish Committee in Proskuriv about the allocation of funds for providing assistance to victims, 02/17/1919-05/23/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 38
description: Minutes of meetings of the accounting commission on the organization of credit assistance to the population affected by the pogroms at the Kyiv Regional Council of Cooperative Societies, correspondence about lending to the victims. description: Copies of minutes of local committees to help victims of pogroms, general meetings of residents, their reports on pogroms committed by detachments of Denikin and the Army of the Ukrainian People's Republic in populated areas of Kyiv province, 26.02.1919-20.11.1919, 0 sheet.

description: Copies of the reports of the representatives of the Central Jewish Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms, testimonies of eyewitnesses and victims about the pogroms committed by separate detachments of the UNR Army in the village of Vasylkov of Kyiv province in 1919.
